message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's not just any item; it's a game-changer in its field, offering unparalleled value and benefits. Given its significance and the unique features it provides, I believe it's worth more than what most people are willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers to you, I am extending this exclusive offer at a price of $10,000. This is a special opportunity tailored for discerning individuals like yourself who appreciate quality and value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
